summary: REDCap allows users to track data manipulation and user activity, automate export procedures for data downloads, and use ad hoc reporting tools. REDCap supports HIPAA compliance through user- based permissions and audit trails. a retrospective review of four different types of outbreaks recently occurred in Illinois. REDCap would have facilitated self-reporting of symptoms and exposures through the design and administration of online surveys to cases and contacts. REDCap’s document upload functionality would have facilitated storage and access of lab reports for foodborne illness, MERS CoV, and NDM outbreaks.
